Related repos

  • Data transformation framework for SQL and Python
  • Maps SQL results to Python objects
  • Python driver for SQL Server
  • SQL replacement language for transforming and querying data with pipelines
  • Chat-based BI tool that converts natural language to SQL
  • SQLModel for Python apps, combines SQLAlchemy and Pydantic for working with databases
  • natural language to SQL engine for querying databases
  • SQL IDE for the terminal with support for DuckDB, SQLite, and more
